item.title: PSWindowsAdminCenter: PowerShell Module to Manage Connections, Feeds, and Extensions
item.description: I had published a PowerShell DSC resource module, last month, called WindowsAdminCenterDsc that uses the PowerShell module that was made available with Windows Admin Center version 1812.
